title: Vector Subtraction Function
description:
DWORD_OF_BYTE creates from 4 individual bytes (B0 .. B3) a DWORD.
A DWORD is composed as follows: B3-B2-B1-B0.
name: V3_SUB

input.name: A
input.description: The first input vector from which the second vector will be subtracted.

input.name: B
input.description: The second input vector that will be subtracted from the first vector.

return_value.description: The resultant vector after subtracting vector B from vector A.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The X component of the resultant vector, calculated as A.X - B.X.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The Y component of the resultant vector, calculated as A.Y - B.Y.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The Z component of the resultant vector, calculated as A.Z - B.Z.
